# Secrets Scan Allowlist - P11
#
# Files/patterns listed here are excluded from secrets scanning.
# Use glob patterns. Comments start with #.
#

# Test fixtures and mocks
tests/fixtures/**
tests/mocks/**

# Documentation with example tokens
docs/**/*.md
README.md
CHANGELOG.md

# Example/template configuration files
*.example.json
*.example.yml
*.template.*

# Generated files
dist/**
node_modules/**
coverage/**

# Build artifacts
*.log
*.lock

# This allowlist file itself
config/security/secrets-scan.allowlist.txt

# Known safe patterns in test files
tests/**/*.test.ts

# Config files that may have placeholder values
config/**/*.example.*
